references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models (LDM), a key technology used in the presented paper's training framework.

references.paper_title: BlockFusion: Expandable 3D scene generation using latent tri-plane extrapolation
references.reason: This paper represents a significant prior art in 3D scene generation, and is used as a baseline comparison for the proposed model.

references.paper_title: 3DShape2VecSet: A 3D shape representation for neural fields and generative diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the 3DShape2VecSet which is used to improve both training efficiency and scene generation quality.

references.paper_title: Repaint: Inpainting using denoising diffusion probabilistic models
references.reason: This paper presents the RePaint approach to image inpainting, a widely used method that the proposed model compares against, and seeks to improve upon.

references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3D objects
references.reason: This paper introduces the Objaverse dataset which is a core component of the pipeline, as it is the dataset used to curate the NuiScene43 dataset.
